files.content:
Banners are a mildly disruptive way to inform the user of something. They stay on the page unless a user action results in their dismissal. There are default Important, Warning, Info, and Success styled banners, but banners can be customized for specific contexts.
Action
const btnBannerAction = document.getElementById('btn-banner-action'); console.log(btnBannerAction); function bannerAction() {   console.log('banner action clicked'); }
